pool.question: Which non-unbreakable lord has the highest leadership?

pool.answer: Guardian provides physical resistance in an Area of Effect to other lords and heroes.

pool.question: What is the armour of Rogue Idol?

What is the range of Waywatchers?
How many hit points does Hell Pit Abomination have?
How many hit points does Dread Saurian have?
What does Star of Avelorn do, and how many units can it affect?
pool.answer: Star of Avelorn restores hit points, and up to 3 units can be affected.

pool.question: What does the ability Mist of the Lady of Fay Enchantress do?
pool.answer: It reduces melee attack and causes damage to enemy units. Both effects are applied in an Area of Effect to enemy units.

pool.question: What stats does Deadly Onslaught increase?
pool.answer: Armour piercing weapon damage, base weapon damage and charge bonus.

pool.question: What does Murderous Prowess do?
pool.answer: Murderous Prowess increases charge bonus, melee attack, armour piercing missile damage, leadership and vigour.

pool.question: What does Martial Prowess do?
pool.answer: Martial Prowess increases melee attack and melee defence.

pool.question: What are all the Lore of Light spells?
pool.answer: Banishment, Birona's Timewarp, Light of Battle, Net of Amyntok, Pha's Protection, Shem's Burning Gaze.

pool.question: What are all the Lore of Death spells?
pool.answer: Aspect of the Dread Knight, Doom & Darkness, Soulblight, Spirit Leech, The Fate of Bjuna, The Purple Sun of Xereus.

pool.question: What are all the Lore of Fire spells?
pool.answer: Cascading Fire Cloak, Fireball, Flame Storm, Flaming Sword of Rhuin, Piercing Bolts of Burning, The Burning Head.

pool.question: What are all the Lore of Life spells?
pool.answer: Awakening of the Wood, Earth Blood, Flesh to Stone, Regrowth, Shield of Thorns, The Dwellers Below.

pool.question: What are all the Lore of Vampires spells?
pool.answer: Curse of Years, Gaze of Nagash, Invocation of Nehek, Raise Dead, Vanhel's Danse Macabre, Wind of Death.

pool.question: How many seconds does The Wintertooth Crown last?
pool.answer: 24 seconds.

pool.question: Does Tiktaq'to's Mask of Heavens work when he is on the ground?
pool.answer: Yes.

pool.question: What stats does The Sword of Couronne affect and how?
pool.answer: The Sword of Couronne decreases melee defence and armour of enemy units in an Area of Effect.

pool.question: What stats does Heartrender & the Darksword affect and how?
pool.answer: Heartrender & the Darksword decreases melee defence and melee attack of enemy units in an Area of Effect.

pool.question: What does Captain Roth's Moondial do?
pool.answer: Captain Roth's Moondial spawns a unit of Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob.

pool.question: Who won HWL Season 6 Playoffs?
pool.answer: Felkon.

pool.question: Who won HWL Season 5 Playoffs?
pool.answer: FlyingTaco.

pool.question: Who won Faction Wars - March 2020 and as what faction?
pool.answer: Hadres (Skaven).

pool.question: Who won Faction Wars - October 2020 and as what faction?
pool.answer: Enticity (Vampire Coast).

pool.question: Who won Faction Wars - May 2020 and as what faction?
pool.answer: Enticity (Vampire Coast).

pool.answer: The Curse, The Restless Dead, Unyielding Will, Wrath of Ptra.

pool.question: What does Witchbrew do?
pool.answer: Witchbrew increases base weapon damage, melee attack, armour piercing weapon damage and causes rampage.

pool.question: What does Enrage do?
pool.answer: Enrage increases damage resistance.

pool.question: What does Primal Instincts do?
pool.answer: Primal Instincts increases charge bonus and melee attack and also causes rampage.

pool.question: What does Ruinous Flesh do?
pool.answer: Ruinous Flesh increases missile resistance and armour in an Area of Effect.

pool.question: What is the projectile base damage of Fireball Upgraded?
What is the projectile armour piercing damage of Shem's Burning Gaze?
What is the projectile base damage of Vindictive Glare?

Which spell cannot miscast when overcast?
pool.answer: The Dreaded Thirteenth.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Durthu's Sword of Daith?
pool.answer: It decreases armour by 30 and causes damage to enemy units in an Area of Effect.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Repanse's The Sword of Lyonesse?
pool.answer: The Sword of Lyonesse increases base weapon damage by 50%, armour piercing weapon damage by 50% and melee attack by 40.

pool.question: What are teh exact effects of Wulfrik the Wanderer's Sword of Torgald?
pool.answer: Sword of Torgald increases base weapon damage by 90%.

pool.question: How does Flaming Axe of Cormac work and what are its exact effects?
pool.answer: Flaming Axe of Cormac imbues fire damage, increases base weapon damage by 22% and melee attack by 9. It's disabled if leadership is lower than 50%.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Skull Wand of Kaloth?
pool.answer: Skull Wand of Kaloth increases base weapon damage by 60%, melee attack by 24, and imbues -16 leadership for 10 seconds.

pool.question: Who won Steel Championship Series II?
pool.answer: Felkon.

pool.question: Who won MS Paint Wars #3?
pool.answer: Crabling.

pool.question: Who won Never-Chosen?
pool.answer: SHOWtime.

pool.question: Who won Death Before Dishonour Season 4?
pool.answer: Enticity.

pool.question: Who won Rise of the Mortarchs Season 1?
pool.answer: Imperator.

pool.answer: Curse of Khsar reduces armor of enemy units by 60 in an Area of Effect.

pool.answer: Malagor the Dark Omen, Khazrak the One-Eye and Beastlord.

pool.question: Which High Elf legendary lords have items that affect hit points?
pool.answer: Alarielle the Radiant and Tyrion.

pool.answer: Bonewood Staff triggers when activating a spell.

pool.question: What is the speed of Carronades?
What is the armor piercing weapon damage of Bloated Corpse?
What is the leadership of The Bloody Reaver Deck Guard (Depth Guard)?
What is the melee defence of The Direpack (Dire Wolves)?
What is the charge bonus of Warp Lightning Cannons?
How many phases are there for the Rage unit ability, and what exact effects does each phase have?
pool.answer: Stage 1 increases leadership, stage 2 increases leadership and physical resistance, and stage 3 increases leadership, physical resistance and melee attack.

pool.question: What stats does Bestial Surge affect and how?
pool.answer: Bestial Surge increases charge bonus and vigour map-wide, while casting.

pool.question: What stats does Felix's Helping Hand increase, and by how much?
pool.answer: Helping Hand increases melee attack by 40 and damage resistance by 44%.

pool.question: What stat does Strigoi Ghoul King's Blood Lust ability affect, by how much and for how long?
pool.answer: Blood Lust increases armour piercing weapon damage by 25% for 33 seconds.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Frenzy?
pool.answer: Frenzy increases melee attack by 8, charge bonus by 8%, base weapon damage by 15% and makes the unit immune to psychology.

pool.question: What is the projectile range and projectile base damage of Searing Doom?
pool.answer: 40 and 24, respectively.

pool.question: What stats does Cascading Fire Cloak increase, and by how much?
pool.answer: Melee armour piercing damage by 25%, and melee defence by 24.

pool.question: What does Doom & Darkness Upgraded do, and for how long?
pool.answer: Doom & Darkness Upgraded decreases morale by 16 for 36 seconds.

pool.question: What does Hand of Glory Upgraded do, and for how long?
pool.answer: Hand of Glory Upgraded increases melee attack by 24, and reload skill by 60 for 29 seconds.

pool.question: What does Birona's Timewarp do, and for how long?
pool.answer: Birona's Timewarp increases speed by 24% and melee attack by 24 for 50 seconds.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Skavenbrew and what is the duration?
pool.answer: Skavenbrew increases increases melee attack, base weapon damage, decreases armour and makes the unit immune to psychology. The duration is 47 seconds.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Shadow Magnet Trinket and how does it work?
pool.answer: Shadow Magnet Trinket increases missile parry by 12 in an Area of Effect.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Warp-Shard Armor and how does it work?
pool.answer: Warp-Shard Armor decreases armour by 23 and melee defence by 5 in an Area of Effect.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Banner of the Hunter King and how does it work?
pool.answer: Banner of the Hunter King increases melee attack by 5, charge bonus by 8% and causes fear in an Area of Effect.

pool.question: What are the exact effects of Star Lance and how does it work?
pool.answer: Star Lance imbues fire damage and flammable (22% weakness to fire damage), increases armour piercing weapon damage by 25%, charge speed by 20% and charge bonus by 50%.

pool.answer: MystEque.

pool.answer: Pacta.

pool.answer: Noob for Life.
